column2: "**Ability to perform regional simulation allowing communities to evaluate resilience and perform what-if types of analysis for natural hazard events**"
"Perform such simulations for ground shaking due to Earthquake"
"Ability to perform such simulations for wave action due to Earthquake induced Tsunami "
"Ability to perform such simulations for wind action due to Hurricane"
Ability to perform such simulations for wave action due to Hurricane Storm Surge
"Ability to perform such for multi-hazard simulations: wind + storm surge
Ability to incorporate damage to lifelines in determination of community resilience
"Ability of stakeholders to perform simulations of different scenarios that aid in planning and response after damaging events"
"Ability to utilize HPC resources in regional simulations that enables repeated simulation for stochastic modeling"
"Provide open-source software for developers to test new data and algorithms"
"Ability to use a tool created by linking heterogeneous array of simulation tools to provide a toolset for regional simulation"
"Ability to utilize existing open-source software for faster deployment"
"Ability to include a formal treatment of uncertainty and randomness"
"Ability to include latest information and algorithms (i.e. new attenuation models
